subject: docs: add validation & reprocessing workflow to playbook
body:
- Document what save-commit.js validates (metadata + analysis fields)
- Document needs-reprocess.json and when it's created
- Document fix-malformed.js for fixing malformed commits
- Update SESSION_NOTES with 763 total commits (all 65 fixed)
- Add fix-malformed.js to key files table
